Entry.JapaneseText: [VARIABLE]
Entry.EnglishText: [VARIABLE]

Entry.JapaneseText: 女の子
Entry.EnglishText: Girl

Entry.JapaneseText: select
Entry.EnglishText: Select

Entry.JapaneseText: 道具屋「ゆきだるま」
Entry.EnglishText: Item Shop

Entry.JapaneseText: ノルゼン
Entry.EnglishText: Nolzen

Entry.JapaneseText: ノルゼン・道具屋
Entry.EnglishText: Nolzen - Item Shop

Entry.JapaneseText: 道具屋
Entry.EnglishText: Item Shop

Entry.JapaneseText: 危ないから外へ出ちゃダメって お母さんに言われたの…… マフマフ、元気かな……
Entry.EnglishText: Mommy said not to go outside because it's too cold... I hope the Muffmuffs are okay...
Entry.Notes: okay, I guess マフマフ is what everyone calls the squirrel things like Zapi(e?), the little mascot critter. dunno what you guys are calling it so I'll just leave it untranslated - マフマフ means Muffmuffs (maxle)

Entry.JapaneseText: ねえ、バイラスはマフマフを いじめないよね？
Entry.EnglishText: Do you think the Biruses will attack the Muffmuffs?

Entry.JapaneseText: マフマフがいじめられてたら 助けてあげてね！
Entry.EnglishText: You gotta save 'em if they do!

Entry.JapaneseText: マフマフがケガしてたら、 治してあげてね！
Entry.EnglishText: Please help any Muffmuffs if they get hurt!

Entry.JapaneseText: マフマフってホントに かわいいから大好き！ だから、毎日外で遊んでるの。
Entry.EnglishText: I love Muffmuffs because they're so cute! I come out to play with them everyday.

Entry.JapaneseText: <speed:0><scale:140>休憩しますか？ はい いいえ
Entry.EnglishText: <speed:0><scale:140>Would you like to rest? Yes No

Entry.JapaneseText: この地震、いつになったら 終わるのかしら……
Entry.EnglishText: Is this earthquake ever going to subside...?

Entry.JapaneseText: 津波でも来たら、 この街なんて簡単に 呑まれちゃうわ……
Entry.EnglishText: If a tidal wave forms this town is done for...

Entry.JapaneseText: いらっしゃいませ。
Entry.EnglishText: Welcome.

Entry.JapaneseText: <speed:0><scale:140> 道具を買う 世間話をする やめる
Entry.EnglishText: <speed:0><scale:140>Purchase Chat Leave
Entry.Notes: do these options not have translations elsewhere?

Entry.JapaneseText: 準備は万全かい？
Entry.EnglishText: Is that everything you need?

Entry.JapaneseText: 色々そろってるよ。
Entry.EnglishText: We've got plenty of items in stock.

Entry.JapaneseText: 準備は万全かい？
Entry.EnglishText: Is that everything you need?

Entry.JapaneseText: <Cyan>幻の庭<White>……<Cyan>古の塔<White>？ さあ、聞いた事ないねえ……
Entry.EnglishText: <Cyan>The Garden of Illusions<White>... ...And the <Cyan>Ancient Tower<White>? Sorry, never heard of 'em.

Entry.JapaneseText: あんた……ガジュマと一緒に 旅をしてるみたいだけど、 気をつけたほうがいいよ。
Entry.EnglishText: I see you're traveling with Gajuma, so maybe you already know... But you should be careful out there.

Entry.JapaneseText: 近頃、この街のヒューマと ガジュマはいがみ合っててね……
Entry.EnglishText: Lately things haven't been too pretty between the Huma and Gajuma in town.

Entry.JapaneseText: 仲良くしてると、スパイだ なんて言われて、同じ種族の 人にも狙われかねないからね。
Entry.EnglishText: You might get accused of being spies, and attacked.

Entry.JapaneseText: お客さんにこんな事を 言うのは気が引けますけど……
Entry.EnglishText: I'm not sure I should be saying this to a customer...

Entry.JapaneseText: 先日の争いの時、私、思ったんです。 やっぱりヒューマとガジュマは 相容れない存在なんだって……
Entry.EnglishText: After that incident the other day I got to thinking... Maybe Huma and Gajuma just aren't capable of ever getting along.

Entry.JapaneseText: つい先日、人魚像のある広場で ヒューマとガジュマの衝突が あったの……
Entry.EnglishText: Just the other day, when a bunch of Huma and Gajuma got into a fight in the square with the mermaid statues...

Entry.JapaneseText: ……あの時のガジュマの顔…… 女王様を思い出したわ…… やはりガジュマは、みんな同じね……
Entry.EnglishText: ...The looks on the Gajuma's faces... It reminded me of the Queen. Gajuma really are all the same...

Entry.JapaneseText: バイラスの群れが街を襲って、 兵隊さんたちが、 大怪我したんですってね!!
Entry.EnglishText: Biruses attacked the town and many soldiers were injured!

Entry.JapaneseText: 治療に必要な物があったら 遠慮なく言ってちょうだい！
Entry.EnglishText: I'll get you anything you need to help with their treatment!

Entry.JapaneseText: お嬢ちゃんもお医者さんなのかい？ がんばってみんなを手当てして やっとくれよ！
Entry.EnglishText: Are you a doctor, young lady? Please, you must help everyone!

Entry.JapaneseText: 治療に必要な物があったら 遠慮なく言ってちょうだい！
Entry.EnglishText: I'll get you anything you need to help with their treatment!

Entry.JapaneseText: ここにはケガ人はいないよ。 早く他の家に行って、 ケガしてる人たちを助けて やっとくれ！
Entry.EnglishText: Everyone here is fine. Please, visit the other houses and tend to anyone injured!

Entry.JapaneseText: ケガした人に、ヒューマも ガジュマもないもんね……
Entry.EnglishText: Everyone was attacked indiscriminately...

Entry.JapaneseText: ……バイラス騒ぎがあってから、 少しだけ街が落ち着いたような 気がするよ……
Entry.EnglishText: ...It seems the city has calmed down some since the Birus attack.

Entry.JapaneseText: あんたたちががんばってくれた おかげなのかねえ……
Entry.EnglishText: It seems we have your efforts to thank for that.

Entry.JapaneseText: なんだか、最近また街の 雰囲気が悪くなってるのよ。
Entry.EnglishText: The city's felt a bit... Darker again, lately.

Entry.JapaneseText: バイラス騒ぎの後、しばらく 街の雰囲気がよくなったと 思ったんだけどねえ……
Entry.EnglishText: And here I thought things might start getting better, after the whole Birus attack happened...

Entry.JapaneseText: ……ジルバって人の話が 伝わった後からなんだけど……
Entry.EnglishText: I believe it started after that Zilva lady's speech...

Entry.JapaneseText: 街のガジュマたちの中には、 もうすぐガジュマの世界になるって 思ってる人もいるそうよ。
Entry.EnglishText: Some of the Gajuma in town seem to think the world is going to change in their favor soon.
Entry.Notes: this might be more extreme than 'change in their favor'

Entry.JapaneseText: あんたは違う……わよね？
Entry.EnglishText: But you don't agree with them...do you?

Entry.JapaneseText: ……ねえ、あんたたち、 旅の途中で聞いた事ないかしら？
Entry.EnglishText: ...Hey, have you heard anything about this during your travels?

Entry.JapaneseText: ジルバっていうガジュマの偉い人が、 これからはガジュマを大事にするって 言ったとか……
Entry.EnglishText: Some important Gajuma named Zilva declared that the Gajuma would have their day soon.
Entry.Notes: not sure if this is another direct quote from Zilva's speech

Entry.JapaneseText: ヒューマはどうなっちゃうの かしら……
Entry.EnglishText: What's going to happen to the Huma...?

Entry.JapaneseText: ヒューマとガジュマはもう 仲良く暮らす事はできないの かしらね……
Entry.EnglishText: Is it even possible for the Huma and Gajuma to put aside their differences now...?

Entry.JapaneseText: どうしてこんな風になって しまったのかしら……
Entry.EnglishText: How did things end up like this...

Entry.JapaneseText: 私も漆黒軍団の仲間入りをしたの！ ギンナルさんたちのように、 がんばるわよ！
Entry.EnglishText: I'm now a proud member of the Onyx Brigade! I'm going to do my best, just like Ginnal!
Entry.Notes: dunno what English name you're using for 漆黒軍団

Entry.JapaneseText: 商売のやりづらい世の中に なって来たね……
Entry.EnglishText: It's gotten harder to do business in this world...

Entry.JapaneseText: <speed:0>『商品の棚』 グミのビン詰やボトル類、 特製センヌキなどが並んでいる。 このセンヌキは使いやすいと 評判の一品。
Entry.EnglishText: <speed:0>- Stocked Shelf - Numerous items used to bottle gels are lined up. The special corkscrews are especially popular for their simplicity.
Entry.Notes: not sure what the exact spelling for the healing items is

Entry.JapaneseText: <speed:0>『グミ販売優良店』 グミを買うならこのお店で！ おいしいヨ！
Entry.EnglishText: <speed:0>- Gel Specialty Store - Fulfill your gel needs here! They're delicious!

Entry.JapaneseText: <speed:0>『ドングリグミ』 マフマフ用のグミ。 ドングリ味。
Entry.EnglishText: <speed:0>- Acorn Gel - Gels made for Muffmuffs. Acorn-flavored.

Entry.JapaneseText: <speed:0>『ピーチグミ』 最大ＨＰの５０％が回復。 とろける甘さ。 ５００ガルド。
Entry.EnglishText: <speed:0>- Peach Gel - Recovers 50% of max HP. Sweet as a peach. 500 Gald.
Entry.Notes: oh, % signs don't seem to work here. I'll let you editors figure this one out

Entry.JapaneseText: <speed:0>『グレープグミ』 最大ＨＰの７５％が回復。 巨峰果汁５％ ２０００ガルド。
Entry.EnglishText: <speed:0>- Grape Gel - Recovers 75% of max HP. Contains 5% grape juice. 2000 Gald.

Entry.JapaneseText: <speed:0>『ライムグミ』 ＨＰ回復力が一時的に上昇。 スッキリ味。 ８００ガルド。
Entry.EnglishText: <speed:0>- Lime Gel - Temporarily increases HP Recovery. Very refreshing. 800 Gald.

Entry.JapaneseText: <speed:0>『マフマフ用グミ新発売！』 当店オリジナルのドングリグミを 食べさせれば、かわいいマフマフは 元気いっぱい、おなかいっぱい♪ 厳しい冬もへっちゃらですよ♪ 詳細はレジでおたずねください。
Entry.EnglishText: <speed:0>- Introducing Gels for Muffmuffs! - Buy some of our original Acorn Gummi to feed those the adorable Muffmuffs! Fill their tummies and watch them frolick about in the snow~! Please inquire at the register for details.
